sentences.sentence: In the movie, Po's father considers the son takes over the noddle business is kind of success.
sentences.translation: 此部影片中，“波”的父亲把儿子能继承面馆当成自己的成功。

sentences.sentence: Hi wind, have you seen my little bird? Hes very very little. he can sing nice song and noddle his head, just as the silver bell.
sentences.translation: 大风，你有没有见过我的小鸟？它很小，很小。像银铃铛一样，会唱好听的歌谣，还会把头摇。
